name: Beispiel_04
html: \~r~\~n~<!-- Trenner in der Strukturverwaltung -->\~r~\~n~<style type=\~q~text/css\~q~>\~r~\~n~.sseparator > td {\~r~\~n~    background-color: #dfe3e9\~d~\~r~\~n~}\~r~\~n~.sseparator > td a {\~r~\~n~    color: #dfe3e9\~d~\~r~\~n~}\~r~\~n~.sseparator > td a:hover {\~r~\~n~    color: #fff\~d~\~r~\~n~}\~r~\~n~</style>\~r~\~n~\~r~\~n~<script type=\~q~text/javascript\~q~>\~r~\~n~var $separator = \~q~:sep:\~q~\~d~ // Kategoriename für Separator\~r~\~n~var $separatorClass = \~q~sseparator\~q~\~d~ // CSS-Klasse für Separator\~r~\~n~\~r~\~n~$(document).on('rex:ready', function(event, container) {\~r~\~n~    container.find('tr:contains(\~q~' + $separator + '\~q~)').each(function() {\~r~\~n~        $(this).addClass($separatorClass)\~d~\~r~\~n~        $(this).find('td:not(.rex-table-action)').each(function() {\~r~\~n~            $(this).html('&nbsp\~d~')\~d~\~r~\~n~        })\~d~\~r~\~n~    })\~d~\~r~\~n~})\~d~\~r~\~n~</script>\~r~\~n~\~r~\~n~

name: Beispiel_07
description: Hinweis in der Struktur bei ausgewählten Kategorien anzeigen
html:
Hinweis:
\~r~\~n~Dies ist eine Testnachricht für folgende Kategorien ' . implode(',', $categories) . '\~r~\~n~'\~d~\~r~\~n~\~r~\~n~if (in_array(rex_request::request('category_id', 'integer', 0), $categories)) {\~r~\~n~ echo rex_view::warning($nachricht)\~d~\~r~\~n~}\~r~\~n~?>

name: Beispiel_08
description: Hinweis beim Editieren von Artikeln in ausgewählten Kategorien anzeigen
html:
Hinweis:
\~r~\~n~Dies ist eine Testnachricht im Editier-Modus für folgende Kategorien ' . implode(',', $categories) . '\~r~\~n~'\~d~\~r~\~n~\~r~\~n~if (rex_category::getCurrent()) {\~r~\~n~ if (in_array(rex_category::getCurrent()->getId(), $categories)) {\~r~\~n~ echo rex_view::warning($nachricht)\~d~\~r~\~n~ }\~r~\~n~}\~r~\~n~?>

name: Beispiel_12
html:
<?php\~r~\~n~//remove redundant (white-space) characters\~r~\~n~$replace = array(\~r~\~n~//remove tabs before and after HTML tags\~r~\~n~'/\>[^\S ]+/s' => '>',\~r~\~n~'/[^\S ]+\</s' => '<',\~r~\~n~//shorten multiple whitespace sequences\~d~ keep new-line characters because they matter in JS!!!\~r~\~n~'/([	 ])+/s' => ' ',\~r~\~n~//remove leading and trailing spaces\~r~\~n~'/^([	 ])+/m' => '',\~r~\~n~'/([	 ])+$/m' => '',\~r~\~n~// remove JS line comments (simple only)\~d~ do NOT remove lines containing URL (e.g. 'src=\~q~http://server.com/\~q~')!!!\~r~\~n~'~//[a-zA-Z0-9 ]+$~m' => '',\~r~\~n~//remove empty lines (sequence of line-end and white-space characters)\~r~\~n~'/[
]+([	 ]?[
]+)+/s' => \~q~
\~q~,\~r~\~n~//remove empty lines (between HTML tags)\~d~ cannot remove just any line-end characters because in inline JS they can matter!\~r~\~n~'/\>[
	 ]+\</s' => '><',\~r~\~n~//remove \~q~empty\~q~ lines containing only JS's block end character\~d~ join with next line (e.g. \~q~}
}
</script>\~q~ --> \~q~}}</script>\~q~\~r~\~n~'/}[
	 ]+/s' => '}',\~r~\~n~'/}[
	 ]+,[
	 ]+/s' => '},',\~r~\~n~//remove new-line after JS's function or condition start\~d~ join with next line\~r~\~n~'/\)[
	 ]?{[
	 ]+/s' => '){',\~r~\~n~'/,[
	 ]?{[
	 ]+/s' => ',{',\~r~\~n~//remove new-line after JS's line end (only most obvious and safe cases)\~r~\~n~'/\),[
	 ]+/s' => '),',\~r~\~n~//remove quotes from HTML attributes that does not contain spaces\~d~ keep quotes around URLs!\~r~\~n~'~([
	 ])?([a-zA-Z0-9]+)=\~q~([a-zA-Z0-9_/\-]+)\~q~([
	 ])?~s' => '$1$2=$3$4', //$1 and $4 insert first white-space character found before/after attribute\~r~\~n~)\~d~\~r~\~n~$_SESSION['xoutputfilter']['content'] = preg_replace(array_keys($replace),array_values($replace),$_SESSION['xoutputfilter']['content'])\~d~\~r~\~n~?>
